name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: seq.io.sort.mb
dfs.namenode.resource.checked.volumes.minimum
description: The minimum number of redundant NameNode storage volumes required.

name: ha.health-monitor.check-interval.ms
description: How often to check the service.

name: dfs.namenode.blockreport.max.lock.hold.time
description: The BlockReportProcessingThread max write lock hold time in ms.

name: hadoop.security.crypto.buffer.size
description: The buffer size used by CryptoInputStream and CryptoOutputStream.

name: dfs.datanode.fsdatasetcache.max.threads.per.volume
description:
The maximum number of threads per volume to use for caching new data
    on the datanode. These threads consume both I/O and CPU. This can affect
    normal datanode operations.

name: fs.getspaceused.jitterMillis
description: fs space usage statistics refresh jitter in msec.
